attributes.action: legitimise a follow-on government by declairing an immediate general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whoever follows Mr Blair should not have the automatic right to continue as prime minister until such time as they decide to call an election. That person's government would not be legitimate until they have the consent of the people through an election to become premier. That is why I am asking the people of the country to tell Mr Blair through this petition; that before Gordon Brown or any other successor can form a new government, he or she must go to the country first.
